meanings.sent1: The nonselective approach allowed everyone to participate in the activity.
meanings.sent2: The teacher used a nonselective method to assign partners for the project.
meanings.sent3: The nonselective lottery system made for some interesting pairings.
meanings.sent4: Her nonselective attitude towards food meant she would try anything once.
meanings.sent5: The nonselective nature of the event made it inclusive for all attendees.

meanings.definition: Not limited to a particular group or type
meanings.sent1: The nonselective restaurant offered a wide variety of dishes to cater to all tastes.
meanings.sent2: The nonselective policy welcomed individuals from all backgrounds.
meanings.sent3: The nonselective party guest list led to a diverse and lively gathering.
meanings.sent4: His nonselective taste in music ranged from classical to hip-hop.
meanings.sent5: The nonselective menu featured options for vegetarians, vegans, and meat lovers alike.

meanings.sent1: The nonselective hiring process ensured equal opportunities for all applicants.
meanings.sent2: The nonselective judge treated every case with fairness and impartiality.
meanings.sent3: The nonselective referee called the game without favoring either team.
meanings.sent4: Her nonselective kindness extended to strangers and friends alike.
meanings.sent5: The nonselective charity provided aid to those in need without judgment.
